description: Obtain the services of one Contractor for the printing, cutting, lamination, binding, and packaging of Victoria-class submarine (VCS) publications.
full_summary:
### Victoria-class Submarine Printing Services
#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
**Contract Reference Number:** CB-315-35081625
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-242046/A
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (SRVTGD)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
**UNSPSC Codes:** 25111701 - Submarines
82121511 - Technical manual or instruction sheet printing

**Request Overview:**
The Department of National Defence (Defence) invites qualified Contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the provision of printing services for the Victoria-class submarines. The Contractor will be responsible for printing, cutting, laminating, binding, and packaging various publications related to the submarines.

**Notice Details:**

| Item | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Closing Date | 11 December 2024, 14:00:00 |
| Regions of Delivery | British Columbia, Nova Scotia |
| Trade Agreements | None |
| Regions of Opportunity | Global |
| Currency |  |
| Contact Person | Jordan Clost, jordan.clost@forces.gc.ca (000) 000-0000 |


### Important Documents:
* Bidder Information Package: [PDF document uploaded to CanadaBuys.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51598/w8482-242046_victoria-class-submarine-printing-services_rfso_0.pdf)
* Contract Requirements: [To be uploaded separately]

### Evaluation Criteria:
The RFSA will be awarded based on a combination of factors, including variations or combinations of the above methods. 

### Terms and Conditions: Please refer to the attached Bidder Information Package for terms and conditions.

### Disclaimer: 
By responding to this Request for Standing Offer, you agree to abide by the terms and conditions of this procurement.

**Your Responsibility:** 
Please review the terms and conditions, procurement documentation, and clarify any doubts before submitting your response.
